Early Access Review

More polished and more varied than the first Polynomial. The visuals are much improved and the new weapons make the combat feel way more satisfying this time around.

I look forward to seeing what gets added in the future.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

+ Great visuals
+ Meditative, but challenging gameplay
+ Lots of levels for early access game
+ Interisting beat-based design
+ Possibility to add your own music (MP3/FLAC/ALAC and more)
+ Great optimization because proper game engine
+ Reasonable price

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Amazing game. Just outstanding. Visuals, music (can use own music), feel, options (many), are first rate. Fractal graphics driven by music, classic space shooter arcade feel, it is fantastic. I had the first one, bought from the website. I am sure they will add more stuff, the passion is evident, and they have a good track record.

Buy it, even just for the fact that no other game does what this does.
voteText: 3 of 3 people (100%) found this review helpful
